segments.text: Excuse me , I don't feel good right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any pills for airsickness ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are . Take one at a time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please fetch me a glass of water . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S1
